data.title: Backgrounder: Improving local roads and bridges in Saskatchewan's rural municipalities
data.meta_description: The federal Gas Tax Fund (GTF) provides Canadian municipalities with a permanent, predictable and indexed source of long-term funding. The Government of Canada will provide Saskatchewan with more than $59.1Â million for community infrastructure through the federal GTF in 2016-17.
